title: The One That Was Supposed To Be About Billionaires
description:
This week on Sibling Rivalry Bob and Monét finally dive into the topic of billionaires but get a little sidetracked. The two brainstorm which musical artists they want to commission to do a song with, guess the legal names of infamous drag queens, predict which historical figures they think would support the gays, and much much more!!
Go to TODAYTIX.com/rivalry and use promo code rivalry to get ten-dollars off your first TodayTix purchase! 
Go to Amazon.com/RIVALRY to try Amazon Music Unlimited FREE for THREE months.
Right now, new customers can save ten percent on their first purchase by going to TruNiagen.com/rivalry and use code rivalry! 
Go to BOMBAS.com/RIVALRY, and get 20% off your first purchase.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
